entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • I can not see MAUI project type in VS 2022 #13099
  • Add an alternate style for desktop / mouse #13098
  • 20x performance hit on Mac #13097
  • [iOS] Images in CollectionView are not getting loaded correctly the first time, until you scroll the list or click [Back] and open the page again #13096
  • ListView IsVisible Strange Behavior #13095
  • Maui Blazor template lacks entitlements necessary to submit to Apple macOS store #13094
    Backlog
  • Grid - Label Height calculation is wrong #13092
    Backlog
  • Android keyboard not hiding if open a new page with Navigation.OpenModalAsync #13088
    Backlog
  • Implementation error in settings manager with .NET MAUI #13085
  • [Android] Crash binding the CarouselView CurrentItem #13084
    Backlog
  • Automatically add the Get Task Allow entitlement to Mac Catalyst apps when building for debugging #13080
    Backlog
  • [M1] 7.0 Maui Blazor app displays blank on iOS 16.2 simulator. #13077
  • ListView GroupHeaderTemplate produces blank headers on iOS and MacCatalyst #13076
    Backlog
  • 创建新项目时，找不到“MAUI”选项 #13075
  • FlexLayout not working after update #13074
    Backlog
  • [iOS] CollectionView multi-select pre-selected item VisualState error #13072
    Backlog

Closed

  • FlexLayout no longer works on iOS/Android #9274
    .NET 8 Planning
  • MAUI should expose x:Name as AutomationId to accessibility tools (like VS accessibility checker) #12913
  • Documentation - add advanced sample for every control and also screenshots for this sample #6011
  • Cursor is trapped in text field during fast text copying/text input. #13064
    Backlog
  • CSS hot reload fails in .NET MAUI Blazor app after 2nd edit #9197
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Grid children default ZIndex is wrong #7752
  • EmptyView of CarouselView isn't displayed on Android #13069
  • Newtonsoft.Json deserialization fails in Release build, works fine in Debug build #13033
  • WinUI fails to deploy with error #13071
  • Reassigning Picker.ItemsSource does not trigger refresh of page #12891
  • EvaluateJavaScriptAsync does not work if WebViewRenderer is used #9211
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Obsolete Picker.MapReload #13091
    area/controls 🎮, control-picker
  • Remove TargetIdiom #13090
    t/breaking 💥
  • Remove Deprecated Application.Properties #13089
    t/breaking 💥
  • [iOS] Fix crash with a hidden CarouselView #13083
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃
  • Remove PhoneDialer.Default #13079
    t/breaking 💥, area/essentials 🍞
  • [Android] Fix Html text rendering issue #13078
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label

Merged

  • [net8.0] Fix format net8 #13081
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update CONTRIBUTING.md #13093
  • fix: Fixed nullable annotations for WeakEventManager. #12950
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Remove format pr workflow #13082
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #13070
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix Download build warning #13067
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix EvaluateJavaScriptAsync using Compatibility WebView Renderer #12901
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • added monochrome element to the AdaptiveIconDrawableXml #12564
    community ✨

Updated

  • Add HttpClient factory for UriImageSource #10995
    area/image :framed_picture:, community ✨
  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    partner/cat 😻, area/setup 🪄
  • [Essentials] Geolocation foreground listening #9572
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Fix syncing modal stack when the window is created/recreated #13025
    area/modal
  • Fix net8 TODOs in code #12577
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials API Docs Misc #12996
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event #11200
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>, platform/android 🤖
  • Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecessary parent) #11439
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • Replace MessagingCenter in AlertManager #12910
